description.oldValue:
,With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on
ARM (ARM64) and prevent sensitive data exfiltration through actions such as
copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, printing, and more.
description.newValue: ,With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on ARM (ARM64) and prevent sensitive data exfiltration through actions such as copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, printing, and more. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
